articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Germany seeks early meeting of EU diplomats over Mideast
articles.description: Germany’s foreign minister has called for a planned meeting with his European Union counterparts to be brought forward to the coming week amid escalating tensions in the Middle East. Heiko Maas said in a statement late Sunday that “Europe now has an important…
articles.content:
Maas said Europe has reliable channels of communication to all sides that should be used to the full extent in the current situation.
He added that Germany will reach out to Iraq to clarify relations following a parliamentary vote to expel foreign troops, ad… [+274 chars]

articles.author: Jonathan Lemire | AP
articles.title: Trump returns to Washington to face a pair of challenges
articles.description: As his two-plus week stay at his Florida resort draws to a close, President Donald Trump returns to Washington on Sunday facing twin challenges: the fallout from the strike he ordered to kill an Iranian general and his looming impeachment trial in the Senate
articles.content: For Trump, the holidays are definitely over. Even before Air Force One touched down outside the divided nations capital, Trump on Sunday faced growing questions from Democrats fearful that the killing of Revolutionary Guard Gen. Qassem Soleimani endangered Am… [+5246 chars]

articles.title: Pompeo’s arrogant dismissal of unintended consequences

articles.content:

articles.author: Rachelle Krygier, Anthony Faiola
articles.title: Venezuela's last democratic institution falls as Maduro stages de facto takeover of National Assembly
articles.description: The move marks a sharp escalation in Maduro’s gambit to end Guaidó’s quest to unseat him,.
articles.content: CARACAS, Venezuela The government of President Nicolás Maduro staged a de facto takeover of Venezuela's legislature on Sunday, swearing in its own candidate as head of the National Assembly in a move apparently orchestrated to rob international credibility fr… [+4043 chars]

articles.author: Rachael Bade
articles.title: Top Republican suggests changing Senate rules to begin Trump impeachment trial within days
articles.description: The idea, while unlikely, highlights the pressure Trump allies feel to begin the trial as Pelosi continues to withhold the charges of abuse of power and obstruction of Congress.
articles.content:
The suggestion, while unlikely due to the high threshold of votes required for changing Senate impeachment rules, underscores the pressure some Trump allies feel as the president stews over the impeachment delay.
Well, were not going to let Nancy Pelosi use … [+6502 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Iranian state TV reports Iran will no longer abide by any limits of its 2015 nuclear deal.
articles.description: Iranian state TV reports Iran will no longer abide by any limits of its 2015 nuclear deal.
articles.content:
TEHRAN, Iran Iranian state TV reports Iran will no longer abide by any limits of its 2015 nuclear deal.
